programme.title: Steve Wilkos
programme.sub-title: Why Are You Dating A Child?
programme.desc: Sheila fears that her teen grand-daughter is having sex with a 26-year old family-friend. Then, Jaquella started dating her boyfriend Shaquille when he was a teen. Shaquille's mother is here to confront Jaquella for sleeping with her child.

programme.title: Steve Wilkos
programme.sub-title: He's Not Your Son
programme.desc: The laziest husband and wife lie about their child in order to get support from a woman who believes the child is her grandchild.

programme.title: Steve Wilkos
programme.sub-title: DNA: It's Your Baby
programme.desc: Gina separated from her husband Nate because she could never get along with his family. But Nate says that he's always had suspicions that their child wasn't really his. Then, Damond says that he doubts that he's the real father of Kendahl's child.

programme.title: Steve Wilkos
programme.sub-title: She's Not Pregnant, We Never Had Sex
programme.desc: Heather received a message from Alisha saying that she was pregnant with Remondo's baby but Remondo is Heathers boyfriend! Plus, Silvina and Clee'chaun have been in a relationship for almost 10 years and they've never met in person!

programme.title: Steve Wilkos
programme.sub-title: Will You Stay To Get Beat?
programme.desc: Ashley alleges that her fiancé John has repeatedly abused both her and her son. To make matters worse, this isn't John's first incident with abuse, as his former girlfriend, another Ashley, was also abused and is now here to save her friend.

programme.title: Steve Wilkos
programme.sub-title: I Think My Wife Is A Prostitute
programme.desc: David believes his wife Shamonda is cheating on him and that she might be having sex for money! Plus, Matt believes that his girlfriend is a prostitute. She admits she has accepted money and gifts from men, but swears she gave nothing in return.

programme.title: Steve Wilkos
programme.sub-title: 3 Year Old Locked in the Basement
programme.desc: Michael and Flora are no longer dating, but they have a 3 year old daughter together. Michael thinks that Flora’s boyfriend Dwayne is abusing his daughter, but is he telling the truth? Watch Steve get to the bottom of this!

programme.title: Steve Wilkos
programme.sub-title: You Failed to Protect Your Son
programme.desc: Taquita’s ex is in custody for murdering her child, but her step-sisters think that she was aware of the man’s abusive behavior! Then, Dianne gained custody of Tanya’s toddler son after Tanya’s ex shook him, but she suspects Tanya is the abuser!

programme.title: Steve Wilkos
programme.sub-title: Steve is Speechless
programme.desc: Nykki, Jayda, Tammy and Pamela are here because Larry has fathered children with them. They say Larry not only an abusive deadbeat, but also engages in drugs, alcohol and pimps some of them out. Don’t miss the drama today!

programme.title: Steve Wilkos
programme.sub-title: I'm Not Sorry I Beat Her
programme.desc: Taylor and Joseph admit to getting into violent arguments where he slapped, choked, scratched and even threw objects at her, but agree that if they can prove neither cheated, then their violent streak will end. But will it end?

programme.title: Steve Wilkos
programme.sub-title: I'll Fight for My Family
programme.desc: A woman is married to one man and engaged to another at the same time. Now the two men are fighting over who's the father of her kids.

programme.title: Steve Wilkos
programme.sub-title: You Won't Beat Me Again
programme.desc: Taking a stand! After years of abuse and living in fear, Kristen finally thought she found the strength to leave her abusive relationship with Terrell behind. He openly admits to abusing Kristen and taking his rage out on her, but thinks he can change for the better. Changing a bad habit is never easy, but Steve may be the last hope this family has.

programme.title: Steve Wilkos
programme.sub-title: I Seduced My Teenage Nanny
programme.desc: After Cassarah became Tim’s live-in nanny, they began a sexual relationship. Her family is livid over the 26 year age gap and claims that he takes her to swingers’ parties. Can Steve help Cassarah leave this dysfunctional relationship?

programme.title: Steve Wilkos
programme.sub-title: Who’s Hurting My Granddaughter?
programme.desc: Maria is convinced that her son’s ex-girlfriend Amy and her new boyfriend Brian are abusing and neglecting her granddaughter. But Amy says that Maria is racist and angry because her granddaughter is being raised in a Hispanic household

programme.title: Steve Wilkos
programme.sub-title: If I Don't Hit Her, She Doesn't Listen
programme.desc: Kelsey says her husband is abusing her. Malcolm believes that Kelsey has been cheating on him since the beginning and that their two kids may belong to another man. Plus, Carrie's boyfriend Chris thinks their child belongs to her ex.

programme.title: Steve Wilkos
programme.sub-title: It’s Been 8 Years, Tell the Truth!
programme.desc: Chante’s daughter accused Danae of sexual abuse. Although Danae was cleared by the authorities, Chante’s mother Shelly never believed her innocence. But is Danae just covering up for her own lies? Did Chante’s mother sleep with her ex-husband?

programme.title: Steve Wilkos
programme.sub-title: My Daughter Tried to Poison Me
programme.desc: Thomazina’s boyfriend died a year ago and she thinks her daughter, Destiney slept with him! She also suspects Destiney tried to poison her with bleach! In December, Chris and Jesse’s baby died and they blame Jesse’s mother!

programme.title: Steve Wilkos
programme.sub-title: Our Brother Should Be In Jail
programme.desc: Brandon spent time in jail after being accused of sexually abusing his niece. He maintains his innocence and claims that this isn’t the first time his niece has accused someone of molestation! Was she coached by his sister’s boyfriend Billy?

programme.title: Steve Wilkos
programme.sub-title: This Child Was Living in Hell
programme.desc: Eric finally won custody of her daughter and suspects his ex Brittney of neglecting her! He suspects Brittney’s boyfriend Freddy of molesting her and knows that his daughter tested positive for meth! But what will the lie detector results reveal?

programme.title: Steve Wilkos
programme.sub-title: Dad, Did You Murder Our Mom?
programme.desc: After Juanita’s mother was murdered, things became strange, especially when her father Eric didn’t attend the funeral. She believes he was involved in the murder, but her sister Nora thinks she’s crazy. Can Steve help put this mystery to bed?

programme.title: Steve Wilkos
programme.sub-title: Steve's Had Enough
programme.desc: At seventeen, Dimitrius has already had three children and now four additional women claim to be pregnant with his baby. Then Ethel and her daughters need Steve's help to right their wrongs and get their family back on track.

programme.title: Steve Wilkos
programme.sub-title: He Beat Me In My Sleep/He Pulled A Gun On Me
programme.desc: Amber may not be the best mother, but her abusive boyfriend Alex is making their relationship and her son's upbringing, even worse. Then, David is desperate to get his kids back from ex-wife Fawn, who alleges David was an abusive father.

programme.title: Steve Wilkos
programme.sub-title: Angry Dad Demands DNA
programme.desc: Today on Steve Wilkos, Steven is desperate to find out who is the real father of his 3 year old son. He found out that his ex, Shannon, was intimate with 3 of his best friends when she got pregnant.

programme.title: Steve Wilkos
programme.sub-title: 22-Year-Old Marries 14-Year-Old Girl
programme.desc: At 12, Crystal dated 20 year old Matt and was pregnant at 13. He served 15 months in prison for criminal sexual assault on a minor and is a registered sex offender. Are they a product of inappropriate love or just misunderstood?

programme.title: Steve Wilkos
programme.sub-title: We Tested You Six Times
programme.desc: Samantha believes that her 3 year old daughter was molested by her ex-boyfriend's brother, Chad. Chad denies sexually abusing the child and even took a voice stress test to prove his innocence. Now he wants to clear his name.

programme.title: Steve Wilkos
programme.sub-title: Do You Have A Gay Double Life?
programme.desc: After finding porn and several email and text exchanges with transsexuals, Quintiqua is demanding that her boyfriend prove if he is bi-sexual or not! Then, Herb dug up proof in the form of pictures of Carl and a woman named Deanna online.

programme.title: Steve Wilkos
programme.sub-title: You Want Him To Be The Father?
programme.desc: Ashley's mother is here because she says she's witnessed first hand Ashley's boyfriend Scott's abusive ways. She says that Scott has completely isolated Ashley and her grandchild from the rest of her family.

programme.title: Steve Wilkos
programme.sub-title: You Chose the Abuser over Your Kids
programme.desc: Jackie and her children live with a registered sex offender; accused of touching his own son, Ronnie takes a lie-detector test and demands a DNA test too.

programme.title: Steve Wilkos
programme.sub-title: Did You Bite and Beat My Son?
programme.desc: Lorri is here because she believes that her grandson is being abused by his mother Alyssa and her ex-boyfriend Josh. She's here to find out the truth about whether or not they are really guilty of this abuse.

programme.title: Steve Wilkos
programme.sub-title: I've Seen Him Hit Her
programme.desc: Valarie is here to get custody of her children because she says their father Roy has been abusing them. Roy says that it's her boyfriend who is the abuser. Then, Jennifer is here to because she want's her sister Amber to leave her boyfriend Ceasarae.
